docs.abstract: Natl Cancer Inst finances cancer information services at 15 centers throughout US to answer questions and allay fears about disease and treatment; also has 24-hr telephone service; information service center locations and telephone numbers listed (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: The above are some typical questions and requests received and answered by a federally sponsored network of cancer information services established to help the public overcome its fear of cancer through knowledge and to help cancer patients and their families cope with the disease.
docs.snippet: The above are some typical questions and requests received and answered by a federally sponsored network of cancer information services established to help the public overcome its fear of cancer through knowledge and to help cancer patients and their...

headline.main: Medical Society Committee Asks Curb on Cancer-Causing Pollution

docs.abstract: NJ Med Soc com urges reduced air pollution, citing potential for causing cancer, soc conv, Atlantic City (S)

byline.original: By DONALD JANSON Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC CITY, May 16 A committee of the Medical Society of New Jersey urged action today to reduce air pollution in the state because of its potential for causing cancer.
docs.snippet: ATLANTIC CITY, May 16 A committee of the Medical Society of New Jersey urged action today to reduce air pollution in the state because of its potential for causing cancer.
